phone in.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to telephone the place where you work, especially in order to report something
phone in.translation[0].definitions[0].e: I’ll phone in and let them know.
She phoned in sick (=telephoned to say that she was ill and could not come to work).
I’ll phone the report in tomorrow morning.
phone in.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to telephone a radio or television show to give your opinion or ask a question
phone in.translation[0].definitions[1].e: There’s still time to phone in before the end of the programme.
phone in.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a radio or television programme in which you hear ordinary people expressing opinions or asking questions over the telephone
